events.text: You don't look really well. What happened?
Mom told me that I'll get married to Juliet. I can't understand that girl! She will beat me up every single day of my life! God help me!
Well, I don't think you should have so much hate in your heart, but well, at least you'll get to see Lilly in the masked ball tonight, remember?
That's right! I'll go there! This may be my chance to approach and talk to her!
